parameters.name: Options
parameters.description: Feature fillet options as defined in swFeatureFilletOptions_e

parameters.name: R1
parameters.description: Radius for uniform radius edge fillet

parameters.name: Ftyp
parameters.description: Type of fillet as defined in swFeatureFilletType_e

parameters.name: OverflowType
parameters.description: Control of fillet overflowing onto adjacent surfaces as defined in swFilletOverFlowType_e

parameters.name: NRadii
parameters.description: Number of radii for variable radius fillet

parameters.name: Radii
parameters.description: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of doubles containing the radii for the variable radius fillet VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.

parameters.name: SetbackDistCount
parameters.description: Number of setback distances for the fillet along the edge

parameters.name: SetBackDistances
parameters.description: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of doubles containing setback distances for the fillet along the edge of size SetbackDistCount VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.

parameters.name: PointCount
parameters.description: Number of control point radii at various points along the length of the edge

parameters.name: PointRadiusArray
parameters.description: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of doubles containing the control point radii of size PointCount VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
